verses.roman:
rāya, bhaṭṭācārya bale,--"tomāra prasāda vine
tomāra hṛdaya ei jānila kemane

synonyms: rāya—Rāmānanda Rāya; bhaṭṭācārya—Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya; bale—say; tomāra prasāda vine—without Your special mercy; tomāra hṛdaya—Your mind; ei—this Rūpa Gosvāmī; jānila—understood; kemane—how.
translation: After hearing this verse, both Rāmānanda Rāya and Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya said to Caitanya Mahāprabhu, "Without Your special mercy, how could this Rūpa Gosvāmī have understood Your mind?"
